meanings.definition: A type of cabbage with curly leaves.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating borecoles in my salad.
meanings.sent2: The borecoles at the market looked fresh and green.
meanings.sent3: The chef used borecoles to create a colorful dish.
meanings.sent4: The garden resembled a painting with borecoles as the brushstrokes.
meanings.sent5: The borecoles added a vibrant touch to the meal.

meanings.definition: To bore or pierce a hole in something.
meanings.sent1: Please borecoles the wood to hang the painting.
meanings.sent2: He borecoles the metal sheet to fit the screw.
meanings.sent3: The carpenter borecoles the wall with precision.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes borecoles into his soul, revealing the truth.
meanings.sent5: The drill borecoles effortlessly through the surface.

meanings.definition: The act of boring or drilling a hole.
meanings.sent1: The borecoles in the wall were done neatly.
meanings.sent2: His job involved a lot of borecoles.
meanings.sent3: The sound of borecoles echoed in the workshop.
meanings.sent4: The borecoles in the ground revealed hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The machine made quick work of the borecoles.
